page.title: 09GROVES AND GUTTRIDGE
page.content: For 100 years{Groves and Guttridge have repaired boats.This winter they lifted 70 yachts out of the water for storage and another 150 for cleaning. We saw a 45foot yacht being lifted out with a hoist.Straps were placed under the hull to form a cradle.The yacht was winched up to hang between the legs of the hoist.The hoist had wheels so it could move the yacht across the yard.There are lots of other small firms in the yard including a sailmaker,a yacht surveyor and a yacht broker.The marina has 200 berths for visitors.This year a concrete breakwater was built to give protection from northerly winds.The marina is close to the High Street.The yard and the marina are very busy places during Cowes Week.
